info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern McDowell, northwestern Rutherford, northeastern Henderson, western Polk and southeastern Buncombe Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Hendersonville, or 4 miles southwest of Fairview In Buncombe County, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hendersonville, Arden, Fletcher, Fairview In Buncombe County, Mountain Home, Lake Lure, Chimney Rock Village, Chimney Rock State Park, Bat Cave and Asheville Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
